website_summaries.verdict: An affordable travel tie case that holds ties and other tie accessories but comes with some concerns over how much space it really has.
pros: Slim build made of sturdy nylon
Has space for cuff links and tie clips
cons: Some owners say it holds 4 ties, but others say it only holds 2
Mesh interior pocket may crease ties

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised by customer service!
customer_reviews.text: When I received this product the stitching on the outside front was coming apart... Like the fabric was cut too short. Sadly, it was a birthday gift and was given after the return time frame had expired. Now it sits in a box under the bed. After my original review I spontaneously received a replacement product from the company that was an upgraded/newer version of what I had bought. They even threw in a few shoe bags as an apology for my troubles. They showed exemplary customer service and I would most definitely shop with them again.
customer_reviews.author: Nichol Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time.Good gift for those who travel & have ties and cufflinks.The gift did not come in its orignal packaging.It came in a plastic clear bag which should have been descibed in the desciption. This was a gift for my dad and he had to try to figure out what it was. Also the zipper is not the best quality.It snagged from the begining.It was hard to open and we feared it would break.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Maria

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what i expected. You can't fit more ...
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly what i expected. You can't fit more than two ties and even with two, it's difficult to keep them organized without pulling them out wrinkled. If you add in the cuff links and/or tie clips, it bulks it up and even leaves an indentation on the ties themselves. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: dlw1122

customer_reviews.title: Too tight for two ties
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in the design of this tie case. You have to fold the ties to fit them in, which makes them quite thick. The case is barely a half inch thick at full capacity, so two ties is a very tight fit. Even with one tie, the mesh puches leave an imprint in your tie due to the tight fit. With two ties the case bulges slightly. Disappointing as the build quality was actually adequate. Makes you wonder if the manufacturer even tested the product...
customer_reviews.author: DeKalb Land Man

customer_reviews.title: Decent with drawbacks
customer_reviews.text: This is helpful for keeping ties in good shape but it’s a tad short, wide, and thin for a perfect fit for two ties. I couldn’t put the ties side by side because this isn’t wide enough to do so I had to stack them, which smooshed them because this also should be a bit thicker to accommodate that. It would also be better if if were maybe an inch longer so the ties don’t have to be bent at the end to fit.
customer_reviews.author: SwissAmerican

customer_reviews.title: Good start-needs some improvements
customer_reviews.text: If you have more than a couple of the tie holders, it is difficult to close. It is a bit stiff at first (closing and zipping). Needs a better way to holder collar extensions and tie chains (not clips). And an area for collar stays. Most guys will stock this with the accessories, then just swap out ties as needed. With a few minor improvements, this would be an outstanding product and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Average American Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Can barely close the case with two ties. Does not seem to have been designed to give a little room for more than one. Unlike the ad picture I had two place ties one on each side and stagger them to ensure I had enough room to zip the case. Can only place flat items in the case so if u though cuff links carrier, forget it.
customer_reviews.author: LuisV

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality at a great price. Better then others I have seen online, one of whom I needed to toss due to poor durability. Note this unit is an inch or two longer which is absolutely critical to avoid an extra fold in a tie
customer_reviews.author: Philadelphia Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great item but not made to take more than two ...
customer_reviews.text: Great item but not made to take more than two neck ties so if you are looking to pack more than two neck ties for your trip, it might be tricky
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: a perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: My husband travels a lot with ties and it is so hard to pack them without getting them wrinkled. This case is a big help! It is not too large or too small, a perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Siyr

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cheap item, but gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: You will notice this is much cheaper than some of the competition. That is for a reason. One of the little snap buttons for holding the ties down popped off the first day I owned it, but it wasn't worth sending back. I use it and it works otherwise, but you can tell it is very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: John Galt

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Took these on trip to our daughters wedding In Italy- easy to carry - kept clothes wrinkle free!!!!
customer_reviews.author: David M . Altamura

customer_reviews.title: It's a great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I never have any idea what to buy my brother - but when I saw this tie case, I knew it would be a hit! He travels quite a bit for work and wears ties (neck and bow) almost daily. I couldn't believe when I found a travel case that would accommodate both types of ties, as well as the accessories (like tie bars!). It's a great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Owler16

customer_reviews.title: Keeps multiple ties secure
customer_reviews.text: Well made and handsome. Works well for me carrying multiple ties and tie clips.
customer_reviews.author: Ice Water

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: If you travel alot then this is a great way to keep your ties wrinkle free with no creases
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Skip it. Go for a proper expensive one.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty crappy product. It's not wide enough so you can barely close it with more then even one tie in it. It's rlly poorly built and materiels are pathetic.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Glick

customer_reviews.title: Very cool idea. I haven't gotten my bowties to lay ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cool idea. I haven't gotten my bowties to lay anywhere near as flat pictured though.To see why, lay your folded bow-tie flat on the table. Notice the collar sticks up. It does the same in the case. Not sure what the solution is really. Perhaps they're just better packed rolled.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan D. Butterfield

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Bermudan Cruises to Business Trips
customer_reviews.text: No more tie rolling, this little storage case works perfectly if you are going anywhere where you need to look you best. This case keeps ties crisp and has lots of extra space to store tie bars and the like. Best thing is, it'll fit right in your garment bag.
customer_reviews.author: Connor McGee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used it recently on a trip. Kept my ties and accessories neat and helped me organize my packing!
customer_reviews.author: Mark V Carter

customer_reviews.title: So nice to carry ties etc while traveling
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves it! So nice to carry ties etc while traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: ... previously order the travel tie case and was not pleased. The company reached out to me and sent ...
customer_reviews.text: I previously order the travel tie case and was not pleased. The company reached out to me and sent their new and improved case, which was just that - new and IMPROVED. The case is slim and compact for ease of travel. The new version is constructed well and it looks much better.
customer_reviews.author: Livia O

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as large as expected. It says it can hold 4-6 ties but even 4 is pushing it.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Schulmerich

customer_reviews.title: A bit thin, otherwisr great.
customer_reviews.text: Thinner than expected. Was hard to close with 2 ties, pocket squares and clips.
customer_reviews.author: Ryal N. Deveau

customer_reviews.title: I got the tie case for my husband and he ...
customer_reviews.text: I got the tie case for my husband and he likes not having to hook his ties around the jacket hanger when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Harris

customer_reviews.title: i love it! no more rummaging around trying to find ...
customer_reviews.text: i love it! no more rummaging around trying to find my ties an cuffs an tie clasps in my suitcase. Would definitely would recommend this for an guy that travels
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Z.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to do... Not high-end, but decent for occasional travel use.
customer_reviews.author: T. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Don't leave home without it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely valuable. I travel a great deal to different countries and this Tie Case has been excellent in protecting my ties in the luggage bags, It also has a space for my cuff links.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Ildefonso

customer_reviews.title: but long enough to fit long ties easily. Pockets useful for collar stays
customer_reviews.text: Narrow enough to fit in briefcase, but long enough to fit long ties easily. Pockets useful for collar stays, etc.
customer_reviews.author: mjmomndad

customer_reviews.title: Perfect idea!
customer_reviews.text: A unique, needed gift for men that travel. My dad and my boyfriend loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Travel Tie Case
customer_reviews.text: Travel tie case . This will get plenty of use. Great design as well as sturdy , reliable nylon components .
customer_reviews.author: D.B. in K.C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This will be great travel. It holds all of my accessories!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Came with the ends fraying and the foam inside falling out. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great carrying case
customer_reviews.text: Great carrying case, but a little Slimmer that I had anticipated. A very tight squeeze for more than two ties.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality tie case at a fair price. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: scottly

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and will be a wonderful gift for my future ...
customer_reviews.text: I never heard of a tie case until I saw this. Very nice and will be a wonderful gift for my future father in law.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Weeks, Jr

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste you money.
customer_reviews.text: It broke when we took it out of the package. What a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sleek and thin, doesn't take up much room in luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey F. Holtzhauser

customer_reviews.title: BAD BAD
customer_reviews.text: Cheap piece of plastic is what it is. It doesn't for 6 ties as they say... barely fits 4 and you'll find it hard to close. Di dnt return it because I left the country.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for travel. Holds 2 ties but it's a little snug. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Only problem is the snap broke on the first try ...
customer_reviews.text: Only problem is the snap broke on the first try when packing. Glued it back together so he could use on his trip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I used this case for my ties on my last business trip. Works very well, no wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Woodallg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great tie holder for traveling! Never leave home without it.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product fits great in a suitcase kept my ties in perfect shape I highly reccomed this product
customer_reviews.author: jeff smith

customer_reviews.title: The design of the travel tie case is very good and I really like how well it packages the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my husband for Christmas. The design of the travel tie case is very good and I really like how well it packages the tie clips and tie. However, if there is 3 ties in the case, the case actually starts to bulge and is a bit hard to close. But the structure is very stiff and wont bend the tie and that is the most important thing. If it is just one or two ties, the case becomes very slim and can be slipped into the side of your carry on luggage. I got this product for a discount in exchange for an unbias review.
customer_reviews.author: Janette

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It's too short. The ties do not fit into it.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Muncy

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product
customer_reviews.text: Traveling abroad and needed a way to store my ties. Unfortunately, when I tried unbuttoning one of the straps, the button came off. Really horrible quality. Even if it worked, don't expect to store more than two to three ties. And if the tie is a bit longer than usual, the container won't store the tie period. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: L. Li

customer_reviews.title: My husband was super happy on Father’s Day he said it was far ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband was super happy on Father’s Day he said it was far his best gift yet. Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Aaliyah Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, quality construction will definitely buy from seller again!
customer_reviews.author: love2shop2much

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this. It protects his ties, is sturdy and easy to use. I think it holds 4 ties at the most.
customer_reviews.author: Skmaury

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: The snap on this item broke on the first use.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this and it will be the perfect gift
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: keeps ties neat
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son who has several ties. The case keeps them separated and allows him to bring ties home from college without getting them all wrinkled.
customer_reviews.author: Billen

customer_reviews.title: great gift for a business person
customer_reviews.text: They loved it and get much use out of it
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

product_meta.title: Travel Essentials Travel Tie Case, Black (18" X 6") Cuff Link/Tie Clips Storage
product_meta.description:
Keep your ties organized and wrinkle free while traveling with this Travel Essential Tie Case. Convenient to fit in your suitcase or garment bag, this tie holder is great for the business traveler in your life. The neck tie holder is constructed of a Nylon blend and has a padded inner lining to prevent ties from wrinkling. Equipped with four elastic straps to hold your ties in place, this luggage accessory can comfortably hold up to 4 ties. A zippered pouch attached to the spine inside the travel tie case is ideal for holding cuff links or tie clips. The tie holder unzips to allow for quick and easy access of your accessories. A simple, convenient design with space to hold up to six ties make this Tie Case perfect for packing your nicest ties for a business trip, keeping ties organized and wrinkle free, or safely storing your favorite family heirlooms.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :18 x 6 x 1 inches; 8.78 Ounces
 * Item model number :10475309
 * Department :Unisex-adult (novelty and luggage only)
 * Date First Available :June 14, 2015
 * ASIN :B00ZNZQIGW


 * Customer Reviews:4.1 out of 5 stars95 ratings Keep your ties organized and wrinkle free while traveling with this Travel Essential Tie Case. Convenient to fit in your suitcase or garment bag, this tie holder is great for the business traveler in your life. The neck tie holder is constructed of a Nylon blend and has a padded inner lining to prevent ties from wrinkling. Equipped with four elastic straps to hold your ties in place, this luggage accessory can comfortably hold up to 4 ties. A zippered pouch attached to the spine inside the travel tie case is ideal for holding cuff links or tie clips. The tie holder unzips to allow for quick and easy access of your accessories. A simple, convenient design with space to hold up to six ties make this Tie Case perfect for packing your nicest ties for a business trip, keeping ties organized and wrinkle free, or safely storing your favorite family heirlooms.

Button down Elastic straps hold ties in place.
Cufflinks and tie clips can be stored in Two convenient pouches.
